WRITING.TITLE: [Spoilers] anyone else notice the writers foreshadowing?
WRITING.TEXT: In the episode when Iris and Barry are in bed, Barry's fringe is down, like Savitar's, later on in the vault, it happens again, I just think they were trying to draw comparisons between them or hint that Savitar was gonna impersonate him.
Well how often do characters like Daenerys speak in Dothraki or High Valyrian? Not really that often
